page.title: 05Housing in the Horton Area.
page.content: The main housing is farmhouses but new expensive houses are being built for the rich.There are some very old houses.There is one which was built in the 1400's.There is a housing estate in the area to the southwest of our square.This is some of the new housing estate of north Yate.The design of the houses are similar to many of the other houses in Yate.The older houses are more traditional to the area but the new houses with new designs make the older houses odd and out of place. The new people make life for farmers very diffcult because they do not respect the land.The new houses are priced at an average of about Â£50,000 but some new executive houses may cost Â£130,000.At Yate Rocks there is a small community of older houses which have been there for about a hundred years,built around the Ford.
